Create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with break. [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
[i]Topple[/i] - Flashback {1}{R}, Remove a counter from you or a creature you control. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
notes: 2.2.0: The soldier tokens were becoming 2/1s so the cost got changed accordingly.
